name: Multiple Carousel
author: dhananjaysingh, Ashwani Dhiman

sections.description:
Using this plugin you can create multiple carousel in pages
or posts both vertical and horizontal , you can give links to
each carousel images  

following is list of features*

***1. You can create multiple carousel with unique name and id, carousel name allow only capital and small letter.***

2. You can also delete the carousel.***

3. You can upload different images to any carousel and can set image side order, also has the option to delete particular images from any carousel.

4. All images have a unique id.***

5. You can link the images to any URL and have option to update later.

6. You can change the image slide Order.

7. You can choose different setting for different carousel .

a. Time delay in second
b. Number of images to scroll
c. Animation speed
d. scroll right to left
e. wrap (end slide on first image, last image and both)
f. vertical slide
g. number of image to visible on frond end
h. Effect
i.  skin
j. Container width, height
k. image width and height
my facebook profile :https://www.facebook.com/dhananjay.singh2 

my company website: http://tejuscreative.com

download full instruction from here

http://plugin.desango.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/Multiple-Carousel-Plugin-instruction.docx

have used jquery carousel from here
http://sorgalla.com/jcarousel/
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Create multiple carousel
  • All carousel have different setting

2.0

  • Fixed Circular Error
  • Reorder carousel Image
  • All Carousel images have own table
